channel.title: Openstack chapter on
channel.description: Recent content in Openstack chapter on

item.title: Keystone
item.description: User Management List users $ openstack user list Create user $ openstack user create --password <user_pssword> <username> Update curent user password $ openstack user password set --password <new-password> Delete User $ openstack user delete <username> Catalog managamenet Create service $ openstack service create --name <service_name> \ --description "<service_description>" <openstack_service_name> example: $ openstack service create --name glance \ --description "OpenStack Image service" image Create endpoint $ openstack endpoint create --region <region_name>\ image public <endpoint_url> example:

item.title: Glance
item.description: List images $ openstack image list Create image $ openstack image create <image_name> \ --disk-format <disk_format> \ --public \ --file <file> Download Image $ openstack image save <image_id> --file <image_file_name.img>

item.title: Cinder
item.description: Cinder’s services List services and show state $ openstack volume service list Manage Type Create a type $ openstack volume type create <type_name> Delete a type $ openstack volume type delete <type_name> List all type $ openstack volume type list Manage Volume List volumes $ openstack volume list List detail from a volume $ openstack volume show <volume_id> Create a volume $ openstack volume create --size <size_GB> <vol_name> Delete a volume $ openstack volume delete <volume_id>
